name: Nuclear Rush (MartinCirice)
description:
Nuclear RushApril 23rd 1972 The tension between the United Federation and the Arztotskan government have been on the rise for a decade. The two forces are engaged in a standoff, even a slight shift in the balance of power could set off a worldwide nuclear apocalypse. Your task is to maintain the balance of the United federation nuclear capabilities, upgrade our capabilities when the Arztotskans try to outgun us, but do not frighten them.DO NOT FAIL. Notes

A game by Oliver Summerfield and Martin Cirice.

Writing and sounds by Oliver Summerfield (~3h).

Visuals and development by Martin Cirice (~6h).
